DOC.brief_summary: Using within-subject design , 42 healthy participant randomly expose three different condition : outdoor mountain hiking , indoor treadmill walk , sedentary control situation ( 3.5 hour ) . Measures include Feeling Scale , Felt Arousal Scale Mood Survey Scale . Univariate ANOVAs use analyse difference condition .
DOC.criteria: voluntary participation pregnancy breastfeed chronic acute disease ( already exist diagnose study ) age 18 70 year unable physically active assessed Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( Shephard , Thomas , & Weller , 1991 )
